value.title: Making sense of the Power BI Premium Gen2 Metrics App

value.title: No Calendar Table? How to add Fiscal Month and Sort in Power BI?

value.title: Power BI and the On-premises Data Gateway: What is it?

Patrick shows you why one particular way is not recommended as it will cause trouble. And then show you how you can use DAX within Power BI Desktop to take this to the next level.
